name: Wild Race
description:
Your car is constantly hungry for fuel and there are only a limited number of refuel tokens. You will have to be efficient to get all the objective tokens before the car runs out of fuel.

Controls:

  • W: Accelerate
  • S: Brake / Reverse
  • A / D: Turn
  • ESC: Pause / Map

My first participation in a Game Jam. Made for the Godot Wild Jam #16 with the theme Short on Time.
